features: 𝐖𝐚𝐬𝐡 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐝𝐫𝐲 𝐚 𝐬𝐞𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮: It contains a bottle brush a nipple brush a straw brush a sub-package bottle a draining rack a draining tray Organizer Case. They are all the tools you need to clean and dry your bottles for hassle-free travels and holidays.

𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐚𝐛𝐲’𝐬 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐬 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭: The BPA-free, odorless, flexible, and durable silicone brush head can be thoroughly cleaned and does not cause any damage to the bottle or nipples. Moreover, the PP materials and smooth-ball contact points do not cause any damage either.
𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭, 𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞: With dimensions of 7.2 x 4.33 x 2.17 inches, it is slightly larger than a Pro Max phone and has superior space use effectiveness.
𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞: The removable draining tray, with a built-in draining rack, is designed for storage. After draining and drying, the base can be just taken off to drain the water.

𝐀 𝐦𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐛𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐞𝐬' 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥: This for-travel kit of bottle cleaner is also a thoughtful gift choice. This kit is an intimate gift for showcasing your care and blessings, suitable for close friends and family alike.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wash and dry a set for travel with you <1>~<7> A bottle brush A nipple brush A straw brush A sub-package bottle A draining rack A draining tray A Organizer Case

Precautions： · Please clean all components before using them · Disinfection method: Disinfect them by steaming or boiling for 2-3 minutes. Avoid contact with the bottom and wall of the pot during boiling. (Sub-package bottles of the PE milk bottle's cleaning agent are resistant to 80 degrees. They cannot be disinfected by steaming or boiling). · The silicone brush head can be removed for high-temperature disinfection. · Keep away from fire and strong heat sources. Avoid direct sunlight · Always use under adults' supervision.

Our Brand’s Story: The Suvast brand was created based on its founder's pursuit of a high quality life. We believe that a quality life means a life that is simple, convenient, and pleasant. We are committed to designing and manufacturing high-quality life and household products that will help people create a more beautiful and comfortable home environment. The Suvast brand is derived from the Sanskrit word "Suvastu", which means "all going well". We hope our products will provide our customers with a happy and smooth living experience. The inspiration of our design stems from nature and environmental conservation. We use natural materials such as bamboo, which is both beautiful, while also complying with the environmental concerns of modern society and the pursuit of healthy living. Paying careful attention to details and craftsmanship, we carefully inspect the quality of each product to ensure that every detail meets the highest standards. The mission of the Suvast brand is to become a reliable partner in people's lives by providing high-quality, practical, and beautiful household products. We want our customers’ lives to become easier, more relaxing and peaceful. We are continuously striving to innovate and advance to provide consumers with premium products and services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pumping moms and traveling parents
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this travel bottle cleaning kit. My little one still drinks milk from a bottle so it was nice to have this kit to carry around. If I were still a pumping mom, I would’ve appreciated this too! It has all the brush heads you need: the large brush head for bottles, the tapered brush for bottle nipples, and a straw cleaner.Other travel kits will only have the brushes and no drying rack, but love how this has a fold out stand to dry the bottles. I also appreciate the included soap bottle. Folds compact which I can easily just throw in a diaper bag, and when I need it, it doesn’t take much space on a countertop near a sink.The other important feature about this kit is that the brush heads are silicone which is perfect because it doesn’t hold onto moisture or breed bacteria like regulars brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a compact bottle cleaning set to use when we stay in hotels with baby since hotel bathrooms are the last place I want to clean and dry my bottles is in a hotel sink.This kit has all the tools you need and I love there is a little bottle to put your soap in too. A lot of the kits I saw only had a straw scrubber and then a bottle brush, but I love how this one has those things plus a nipple specific scrubber too! The whole thing packs up nicely and the case fits perfectly into our travel bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful for on the go!
reviews.reviewText: I took this when we went on vacation and as most parents know, you can't REALLY clean bottled while out and about. This travel kit made life so easy. We were able to clean the different parts of our sons bottle while in a hotel room. The drying rack was incredibly useful! The hotel bathroom was really small so we didn't have room to set things out to dry but this kit made it easy to leave everything drying on the dresser or Nightstand without making a mess. I do think the silicone bristles work better for the residue from breast milk or formula, so if you bottle feed with those you'll love it! The bristles aren't strong or sturdy enough for hard scrubbing but work great for the residue. I really liked the small pump for soap. Very handy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So convenient. Fits easily into suitcase or carry on bag. I use this when travelling instead of always purchasing items where I visit or hurling the kitchen behind me when I go away. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been all my life
reviews.reviewText: This makes travel with a baby so much easier!!! Highly highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: This is a great travel accessory to have when you have a baby or a toddler to clean their bottles, sippy cups, snack cups & food pouches on the go. The little soap bottle is a really nice touch and the pump is really nice as well.
